message.body: Hi Bailey! How are you doing? Can't wait to see you next weekend! I've been searching for some kind of part time/odd job to save up some extra cash, but I've had no luck. Do you know of anything I can do near campus, or anything you need done around the house? Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thank you and see you soon!

Hi Will. Glad to hear from you and will look forward to seeing you soon. Regarding work, do you have any transportation? I have a friend in Va Highlands who may need some help. I may need some things done around house too. Will think about it.
